name: Unite Us
description: Unite Us is a two-player game developed during Art Game Jam 2019 @ BUG Istanbul where the jam theme was "Us". In that regard, the game is developed on the idea that all of "us" experience conflict either as two people or within our minds. So, we are often compelled to reconcile with one another to come together or get something done.  Accordingly, this game compels two players to reach the same color in order to pass the level. Each crystal on the way changes the color of the background and they find themselves cooperating if they want to unite the seperated twins on two sides of the screen.
